typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as integer,
		date as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> casesDeath
casesDeath filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterRecords
FilterRecords select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		source,
		each(match(name == 'date'),
			'reported' + '_date' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredFields
SelectRequiredFields pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		population,
		source,
		reported_date),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['confirmed cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotCounts
